results.title: Metformin improves the therapeutic efficacy of low-dose albendazole against experimental alveolar echinococcosis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ improves the therapeutic efficacy of low-dose @CHEMICAL_Albendazole @CHEMICAL_MESH:D015766 @@@albendazole@@@ against experimental @<m>DISEASE_Alveolar_echinococcosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536591 @@@alveolar echinococcosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Loos JA, Coccimiglio M, Nicolao MC, Rodrigues CR, Cumino AC. Metformin improves the therapeutic efficacy of low-dose albendazole against experimental alveolar echinococcosis. Parasitology. 2022 Jan;149(1):138-144. PMID: 35184788

results.title: Metformin Suppresses Development of the Echinococcus multilocularis Larval Stage by Targeting the TOR Pathway.
results.text_hl: Taken together, these results introduce @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ as a promising candidate for @<m>DISEASE_Alveolar_echinococcosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536591 @@@AE@@@ treatment.

citations.NLM: Loos JA, Dávila VA, Brehm K, Cumino AC. Metformin Suppresses Development of the Echinococcus multilocularis Larval Stage by Targeting the TOR Pathway. Antimicrob Agents Chemother. 2020 Aug 20;64(9):. PMID: 32540980
